Easy Clue Steps (7 Possible Steps)[edit | edit source]

Cryptics[edit | edit source]

Clue Notes Task Image
Dig in the centre of a great kingdom of 5 cities. Dig in front of the large statue in the centre of Great Kourend.
I wouldn't wear this jean on my legs. Talk to Father Jean in the Hosidius church.
Monk's residence in the far west. See robe storage device. Search the drawers in the south tent of the monk's camp found west of the Hosidius mine.
Salty peter. Talk to Konoo who is digging saltpetre in Hosidius.
Search the open crate found in the Hosidius kitchens. The Hosidius Kitchen is east of the mess in Hosidius.
Talk to Charles in Port Piscarilius. Charles is found by Veos' ship in Port Piscarilius.
Thanks, Grandma! Tynan can be found in the north-east corner of Port Piscarilius.

Medium Clue Steps (14 Possible Steps)[edit | edit source]

Anagrams[edit | edit source]

Anagram Solution Location Challenge answer
A Heart Aretha Soul Altar 2
Clash Ion Nicholas Most north-eastern point of Port Piscarilius, north of the fishing shop. 4
HIS PHOR Horphis Arceuus Library 1
I Am Sir Marisi Marisi is a farmer found in the allotment patch located within Hosidius. 5
Low Lag Gallow Vinery in Hosidius. 12
Pacinng a taie Captain Ginea Building east of Shayzien Combat Ring. 113
R SLICER Clerris Dense essence mine 738
Tamed Rocks Dockmaster Port Piscarilius, building north-east of the general store. 5

Ciphers[edit | edit source]

Cipher Solution Location Challenge answer
ECRVCKP MJCNGF Captain Khaled Large eastern building in Port Piscarilius 5
QSPGFTTPS HSBDLMFCPOF Professor Gracklebone Arceuus Library, ground floor (fairy ring code CIS, if 80,000 coins paid) 9

14 degrees 20 minutes north,

14.20N,

None.

File:Coordinate clue 14.20N 30.45W.png
_30.45W%20map.png Please upload a map!
Location notes
Dig in the graveyard just east of the hill giants west of the Shayzien bank. Easily reached by teleporting with the fairy rings with code DJR.
Coordinates Shorthand Requirements Fight
17 degrees 39 minutes north,

37 degrees 16 minutes west

17.39N,

37.16W

45 Farming
Image Map

_37.16W%20map.png Please upload a map!
Location notes
Inside the Farming Guild, close to the entrance. Dig next to the western patch of marigolds.

Emote Clues[edit | edit source]

Clue Items Notes Map
Beckon in the combat ring of Shayzien. Show your anger before you talk to me. Equip an adamant platebody, adamant full helm and adamant platelegs. The Combat Ring of Shayzien is located south-east of the bank.
Clap your hands north of Mount Karuulm. Spin before you talk to me.

Equip an adamant warhammer, mithril boots and a ring of life.

Fairy ring code CIR or Battlefront teleport, and run to the northern end of the volcano.

  • Amulet of glory (t)
  • Robin hood hat
  • 3rd age equipment (Excluding Weapons, Tools & Cloak)

Requirements[edit | edit source]

  • High Combat Stats (To kill Saradomin Wizard)
  • 5% Shayzien Favour
  • Spade

Anagram[edit | edit source]

Anagram Solution Location Challenge answer
My Mangle Lal Lammy Langle Hosidius spirit tree patch Puzzle box

Coordinates[edit | edit source]

Coordinates Shorthand Requirements Fight
16 degrees 48 minutes north,

30 degrees 01 minutes west

16.48N,

30.01W

5% Shayzien favour.
Saradomin wizard
Image Map
Location notes
In the west end of the Lizardman Canyon between Lovakengj and Shayzien. Entering the Canyon requires 5% Shayzien favour. Use fairy ring code DJR to get there quickly.
Coordinates Shorthand Requirements Fight
19 degrees 24 minutes north,

30 degrees 37 minutes west

19.24N,

30.37W

None.
Saradomin wizard
Image Map
Location notes
In Lovakengj, dig south of the burning man located south-east of the lovakite mine.

Cryptics[edit | edit source]

Clue Notes Task Image
CIS 0009 Dig 9 steps west of the centre of the fairy ring. Fairy Ring Code CIS (You can also use Skills necklace to teleport to the Woodcutting Guild and run north, or use games necklace to teleport to Wintertodt camp and walk south, or walk north from the minecarts.)
The effects of this fire are magnified. Dig by the fire beside Ket'sal K'uk in the westernmost part of the Kebos Swamp.

Image Map
Location notes
One step north of the bronze pickaxe spawn found in the small ruins north of the Hosidius mine.

Cryptic[edit | edit source]

Clue Notes Task Image
A demon's best friend holds the next step of this clue. Kill a hellhound, which can be found in the north-western section of the Catacombs of Kourend.

Emote[edit | edit source]

Clue Items Notes Map
Shrug in the Shayzien command tent. Equip a blue mystic robe bottom, a rune kiteshield and any bob shirt. The command tent is the southernmost tent in Shayzien.

Map[edit | edit source]

Map Location Image
Directly south of the Soul Altar.

Ancient Wizards
Image Map
Location notes
The coordinate is located in the crypt of the Arceuus church. To reach the crypt, head to the church and climb up the stairs, and then, climb down the stairs that follow.

Players can make the ancient wizards unaggressive by going up the stairs and climbing down immediately.

Cryptics[edit | edit source]

Clue Notes Task Image
Darkness wanders around me, but fills my mind with knowledge. Speak to Biblia on the Arceuus Library's top floor.
She's small but can build both literally and figuratively, as long as you have their favour Speak to Lovada south of the Lovakengj blast mine.
Shhhh! Speak to Logosia in the Arceuus Library's ground floor.
This place sure is a mess. Ewesey is located in the Hosidius mess hall.

See robe storage device. |note=Search the drawers in the south tent of the monk's camp found west of the [[Hosidius mine]]. |task=search |image=Cryptic clue - see robe storage device.png |level=1}} {{Cryptics |clue = Salty peter. |note = Talk to [[Konoo]] who is digging [[saltpetre]] in [[Hosidius]]. |task = talk |image= Cryptic clue - talk to konoo.png |level = 1}} {{Cryptics |clue=Search the open crate found in the Hosidius kitchens. |note=The [[Hosidius Kitchen]] is east of the [[mess]] in [[Hosidius]]. |task=search |image=Cryptic clue - search crates in hosidius kitchen.png |level=1}} {{Cryptics |clue=Talk to Charles in Port Piscarilius. |note=[[Charles]] is found by [[Veos]]' ship in [[Port Piscarilius]]. |task=talk |image=Cryptic clue - talk to charles.png |level=1}} {{Cryptics |clue=Thanks, Grandma! |note=[[Tynan]] can be found in the north-east corner of [[Port Piscarilius]]. |task=talk |image=Cryptic clue - talk to tynan.png |level=1}} |} ==Medium Clues== ===Noteworthy Rewards=== *[[Ranger boots]] *[[Holy sandals]] *[[Spiked manacles]] *[[Wizard boots]] *God [[Mitre]]s *[[Vestment cloak]]s *[[Yew shortbow]] *[[Green d'hide body]] and [[Green d'hide chaps]] ===Requirements=== *45 [[Farming]] *30 [[Defence]] *30 [[Attack]] *[[Spade]] *[[Adamant full helm]] *[[Adamant platebody]] *[[Adamant platelegs]] *[[Adamant warhammer]] *[[Mithril Boots]] (52 [[Slayer]]) *[[Ring of life]] (43 [[Crafting]] and 57 [[Magic]]) OR (65 [[Hunter]]) ===Sources=== {{Dropping monsters list|Clue scroll (medium)|limit=500}} ===Medium Clue Steps (14 Possible Steps)=== ====Anagrams==== {|class="wikitable" border="2" !Anagram !Solution !Location ![[Challenge scrolls (Treasure Trails)|Challenge]] answer |- |''A Heart'' |[[Aretha]] |[[Soul Altar]] |2 |- |''Clash Ion'' |[[Nicholas]] |Most north-eastern point of [[Port Piscarilius]], north of the fishing shop. |4 |- |''HIS PHOR'' |[[Horphis]] |[[Arceuus Library]] |1 |- |''I Am Sir'' |[[Marisi]] |[[Marisi]] is a farmer found in the [[allotment patch]] located within [[Hosidius]]. |5 |- |''Low Lag'' |[[Gallow]] |[[Vinery]] in [[Hosidius]]. |12 |- |''Pacinng a taie'' |[[Captain Ginea]] |Building east of [[Combat Ring (Shayzien)|Shayzien Combat Ring]]. |113 |- |''R SLICER'' |[[Clerris]] |[[Dense essence mine]] |738 |- |''Tamed Rocks'' |[[Dockmaster]] |[[Port Piscarilius]], building north-east of the general store. |5 |} ====Ciphers==== {| class="wikitable sortable" !Cipher !Solution !Location ![[Challenge scrolls (Treasure Trails)|Challenge]] answer |- |ECRVCKP MJCNGF |[[Captain Khaled]] |Large eastern building in [[Port Piscarilius]] |5 |- |QSPGFTTPS HSBDLMFCPOF |[[Professor Gracklebone]] |[[Arceuus Library]], ground floor ([[fairy ring]] code {{Fairycode|CIS}}, if 80,000 coins paid) |9 |} ====Coordinates==== {{Coordinates |coords = 14 degrees 20 minutes north,
30 degrees 45 minutes west |req = No |image = Coordinate clue 14.20N 30.45W.png |notes = Dig in the [[Graveyard of Heroes|graveyard]] just east of the [[hill giant]]s west of the [[Shayzien]] bank. Easily reached by teleporting with the [[fairy rings]] with code {{fairycode|DJR}}. |fight = No |level = 2}} {{Coordinates |coords = 17 degrees 39 minutes north,
37 degrees 16 minutes west |req = 45 [[Farming]] |fight = No |image = Coordinate clue 17.39N 37.16W.png |notes = Inside the [[Farming Guild]], close to the entrance. Dig next to the western patch of marigolds. |level = 2}} ====Emote Clues==== {| class="wikitable" width="100%" ! width="33%" |Clue ! width="12%" |Items ! width="40%" |Notes ! width="15%" |Map |- |''Beckon in the combat ring of Shayzien. Show your anger before you talk to me. Equip an adamant platebody, adamant full helm and adamant platelegs.'' |{{plinkp|Adamant platebody}} {{plinkp|Adamant full helm}} {{plinkp|Adamant platelegs}} |The [[Combat Ring (Shayzien)|Combat Ring]] of [[Shayzien]] is located south-east of the bank. |[[File:Emote clue - beckon shayzien ring.png|150px]] |- |''Clap your hands north of Mount Karuulm. Spin before you talk to me.'' ''Equip an adamant warhammer, mithril boots and a ring of life.'' |{{plinkp|Adamant warhammer}} {{plinkp|Mithril boots}} {{plinkp|Ring of life}} |[[Fairy ring]] code {{fairycode|CIR}} or [[Battlefront teleport]], and run to the northern end of the volcano. |[[File:Emote clue - clap Mount Karuulm.png|150px]] |} ==Hard Clues== ===Noteworthy Rewards=== *[[Rune platebody]], [[Rune platelegs]]/[[Rune plateskirt]] & [[Rune kiteshield]] *[[Black dragonhide armour]] (Excluding shield) *[[Magic shortbow]] *[[Rune axe]] & [[Rune pickaxe]] *[[Blessed dragonhide armour]] *[[Rune god armour]] *God [[Stole]]s *[[Enchanted robes]] *[[Amulet of glory (t)]] *[[Robin hood hat]] *[[3rd age equipment]] (Excluding Weapons, Tools & Cloak) ===Requirements=== *High Combat Stats (To kill [[Saradomin Wizard]]) *5% [[Shayzien]] [[Favour]] *[[Spade]] ===Sources=== {{Dropping monsters list|Clue scroll (hard)|limit=500}} ===Hard Clue Steps (5 Possible Steps)=== ====Anagram==== {|class="wikitable" border="2" !Anagram !Solution !Location ![[Challenge scrolls (Treasure Trails)|Challenge]] answer |- |''My Mangle Lal'' |[[Lammy Langle]] |[[Hosidius]] [[spirit tree patch]] |[[Treasure Trails/Guide/Puzzle boxes|Puzzle box]] |} ====Coordinates==== {{Coordinates |coords = 16 degrees 48 minutes north,
30 degrees 01 minutes west |req = 5% [[Shayzien]] [[favour]]. |fight = [[Saradomin wizard]] |image = Coordinate clue 16.48N 30.01W.png |map = 16.48N 30.01W map |notes = In the west end of the [[Lizardman Canyon]] between [[Lovakengj]] and [[Shayzien]]. Entering the Canyon requires 5% Shayzien favour. Use [[fairy ring]] code {{Fairycode|DJR}} to get there quickly. |level = 3 }} {{Coordinates |coords = 19 degrees 24 minutes north,
30 degrees 37 minutes west |req = No |fight = [[Saradomin wizard]] |image = Coordinate clue 19.24N 30.37W.png |map = 19.24N_30.37W_map |notes = In [[Lovakengj]], dig south of the burning man located south-east of the [[lovakite mine]]. |level=3}} ====Cryptics==== {| class="wikitable" width="100%" !Clue !Notes !Task !Image {{Cryptics |clue=CIS 0009 |note=Dig 9 steps west of the centre of the [[fairy ring]]. Fairy Ring Code CIS (You can also use [[Skills necklace]] to teleport to the [[Woodcutting Guild]] and run north, or use games necklace to teleport to Wintertodt camp and walk south, or walk north from the minecarts.) |task=dig |image=Cryptic clue - CIS 0009.png |level=3 }} {{Cryptics |clue = The effects of this fire are magnified. |note=Dig by the fire beside [[Ket'sal K'uk]] in the westernmost part of the [[Kebos Swamp]]. |task=dig |image=Cryptic clue - dig Kebos Swamp.png |level=3 }} |} ==Elite Clues== ===Noteworthy Rewards=== *[[Rune platebody]], [[Rune platelegs]]/[[Rune plateskirt]] & [[Rune kiteshield]] *[[Dragonstone bracelet]] *[[Rune crossbow]] *[[Fremennik kilt]] *[[Holy Wraps]] *[[Gilded coif]] *[[3rd age equipment]] (Excluding tools) ===Requirements=== *40 [[Defence]] *40 [[Magic]] *High Combat Stats (for killing the [[Bandosian guard]] or [[Armadylean guard]]) *[[Mystic robe bottom]](Blue) (93 [[Hunter]] OR 95 [[Slayer]]) *[[Rune kiteshield]] *Any [[Bob shirt]] *[[Spade]] ===Sources=== {{Dropping monsters list|Clue scroll (elite)|limit=500}} ===Elite Clue Steps (6 Possible Steps)=== ====Anagrams==== {|class="wikitable" border="2" !Anagram !Solution !Location ![[Challenge scrolls (Treasure Trails)|Challenge]] answer |- |''At Herg'' |[[Regath]] |Southeastern corner of [[Arceuus]] in the [[Regath's Wares|General Store]]. |25 |- |''Our Own Needs'' |[[Nurse Wooned]] |[[Shayzien]] infirmary, north of [[Xeric's Lookout]]. |19 |} ====Coordinates==== {{Coordinates |coords = 10 degrees 54 minutes north,
20 degrees 50 minutes west |req = No |fight = [[Bandosian guard]] or [[Armadylean guard]] |image = Coordinate clue 10.54N 20.50W.png |map = 10.54N 20.50W map |notes = One step north of the [[bronze pickaxe]] spawn found in the small ruins north of the [[Hosidius mine]]. |level = 4 }} ====Cryptic==== {| class="wikitable" width="100%" !Clue !Notes !Task !Image {{Cryptics |clue=A demon's best friend holds the next step of this clue. |note=Kill a [[hellhound]], which can be found in the north-western section of the [[Catacombs of Kourend]]. |task=kill |image= Cryptic clue - kill hellhound.png |level=4}} |} ====Emote==== {| class="wikitable" width="100%" ! width="33% " |Clue ! width="12%" |Items ! width="40%" |Notes ! width="15%" |Map |- |''Shrug in the Shayzien command tent. Equip a blue mystic robe bottom, a rune kiteshield and any bob shirt.'' |{{plinkp|Mystic robe bottom}} {{plinkp|Rune kiteshield}} {{plinkp|Bob shirt|pic=Bob's black shirt}} |The command tent is the southernmost tent in [[Shayzien]]. |[[File:Emote clue - shrug Shayzien command tent.png|150px]] |} ====Map==== {| class="wikitable sortable" !Map !Location !Image |- |[[File:Map clue Soul Altar.png|200px]] |Directly south of the [[Soul Altar]]. |[[File:Map clue solution Soul Altar.png|none|thumb|250x250px]] |} ==Master Clues== ===Noteworthy Rewards=== *[[Bloodhound]] *[[Robes of darkness]] *[[Obsidian cape (r)]] *[[3rd age equipment]] ===Requirements=== *60 [[Woodcutting]] *85 [[Farming]] *10 [[Slayer]] (Highly Recommended) *100% [[Shayzien]] [[Favour]] *High Combat Stats (Kill [[Ancient Wizard]]s and [[Brassican Mage]]) *[[Face mask]] (Highly Recommended) *[[Spade]] *[[Strange Device]] (available from [[Watson]]) ===Sources=== {{Drop sources|Clue scroll (master)|limit=500}} ===Master Clue Steps (35 Possible Steps)=== ====Anagrams==== {|class="wikitable" border="2" !Anagram !Solution !Location ![[Challenge scrolls (Treasure Trails)|Challenge]] answer |- |''Slam Duster Grail'' |[[Guildmaster Lars]] |[[Woodcutting Guild]] in [[Hosidius]]. |[[Light box]] or [[Treasure Trails/Guide/Puzzle boxes|puzzle box]]. |- |''Twenty Cure Iron'' |[[New Recruit Tony]] |[[Graveyard of Heroes]] in [[Shayzien]]. |[[Light box]] or [[Treasure Trails/Guide/Puzzle boxes|puzzle box]] |} ====Coordinates==== {{Coordinates |coords = 16 degrees 41 minutes north,
